DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy remote ischemic preconditioning prevent contrast medium-induced nephropathy population high risk patient undergo coronary angiography . Half participant receive precondition procedure half receive sham procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Renal PRotection Against Contrast mEdium-induced nephroPathy High Risk Patients undErgoing Coronary Angiography
DOC.detailed_description: Contrast medium-induced nephropathy big impact clinical outcome patient suffer renal insufficiency undergo percutaneous coronary intervention . Remote ischemic preconditioning prove protect myocardium patient undergo percutaneous coronary angiography . We evaluate effect remote precondition renal protection .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient head coronary angiography 2 . Glomerular filtration rate : ≤ 40ml/min/1,73m² ( MDRD equation ) ≤ 60ml/min/1,73m² ( MDRD equation ) 1 additional risk factor : age > 75 year , NYHA ≥ III/IV , diabetes mellitus 3 . Signed informed consent 1 . Preoperative assessment / dilate cardiomyopathy assessment 2 . Acute STsegment elevation myocardial infarction 3 . Cardiogenic shock require pressor amine systolic blood pressure < 80mmHg 4 . Resuscitation cardiac arrest 5 . Intraaortic balloon pump 6 . Contraindication repeted use upperarm pressure cuff 7 . Extrarenal epuration 8 . No health insurance coverage 9 . Legal incapacity ( patient tutorship , curatorship judicial protection ) 10 . Patient enrol another interventional trial washout period 11 . Incapacity/impossibility undergo 12month followup 12 . Patient refusal
